title: Sunlight Use
image_desc: A split image showing healthy green plants in bright sunlight on one side and pale, weak plants in shade on the other.  The other half shows a person enjoying the sun on a beach.
content: hi, sunlight helps vitamin D production.
narration: Sunlight is really important.  Plants need it to grow strong and healthy,  like you see in this picture.  And for us, sunlight helps our bodies make vitamin D, which is good for our bones and overall health.  So let's get some sun, but remember to use sunscreen!
